delete.desc: Deletes a Prediction in the hub.

params.name: resourceGroupName
params.desc: The name of the resource group.

get.desc: Gets all the predictions in the specified hub.

params.name: resourceGroupName
params.desc: The name of the resource group.

200.desc: OK. Successfully get all the predictions in the hub.
